services.heading: Our Services
services.subheading: A private equestrian club providing premium services to horse lovers

beginners.title: Horse Riding for Beginners
beginners.desc: Structured lessons to build confidence and foundational riding skills.

jumping.title: Jumping Level Training
jumping.desc: Advanced programs for riders refining their jumping techniques.

stableRental.title: Daily Rent of the Stable
stableRental.desc: Rent the stable for private events, families, and groups.

transportation.title: Horse Transportation
transportation.desc: Reliable and secure transportation for your horse.

safari.title: Horse Riding Safari
safari.desc: Discover the natural beauty of Kurdistan on horseback.

socialResponsibility.title: Social Responsibility
socialResponsibility.desc: Supporting communities and welcoming people of determination.

story.heading: Our Story
story.text: Mam Center is a private equestrian club that provides services to horse lovers, including horse riding and show jumping courses for women, men and children of all kinds, and how to properly deal with horses with high professionalism and creating a social environment for horse lovers, their families and friends.
